name: Penalty Hero
description:
"Today, you become a HERO"

The penalties. The moment of truth. When the football match is over and there weren't winners. When glory and defeat are decided between a kicker and YOU, the goalkeeper.
Pick a side...? Or stay in the center...? Quick! Make a decision!
But be prepared, because the kicker has some special shoots too!

*** FEATURES ***
- Awesome retro pixel graphics!
- Over 10+ Goalkeeper heroes to choose from! (More coming soon!)
- Special shoots: be careful with this tricky balls!
- Quick Mode: be the ultimate goalkeeper in this quick play!
- Hero Mode: this shootout isn't over until the referee says it, so you better save as many goals as you can!
- Touch or Swipe controls
- 3 difficulties : Easy, Normal and Hard
- Leaderboards: compete with your friends for the highest score in each difficulty!
